org.pepstock.charba.client.options.scales

Class CartesianScaleLabel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.JavaScriptObjectContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.ChartContainer
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.options.scales.CartesianScaleLabel

  • public class CartesianScaleLabel
extends ChartContainer
    When creating a chart, you want to tell the viewer what data they are viewing. To do this, you need to label the axis.
    The scale label configuration defines options for the scale title. Note that this only applies to cartesian axes.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
